message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer for the product is $900000. I'm confident that you'll find it a fair price considering its value to you is $1200000. Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle of my initial offer and your counteroffer. My revised offer is $925000. I believe this price reflects the value you place on the product, and I'm willing to compromise to reach a deal. Let me know if this is more in line with what you're looking for.

I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit far from my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $875000. I'm confident that's a fair price considering the value I place on the product.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence and willingness to find a mutually beneficial price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. My revised offer is $912500. I think this is a reasonable compromise, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still a bit far from my target. I'm willing to offer $875000 again, as I think it's a fair price considering the value I place on the product. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.

Bob, I understand you're still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go back to your previous offer of $875000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. My revised offer is $920000. I think this is a fair price considering the value you place on the product, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.

I understand you're trying to get closer to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit far from my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $920000 and my previous offer of $875000, so I'll offer $897500. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go down to $897500. I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I'm starting to think that selling to John for $800000 might be a more attractive option. However, I'm still willing to work with you. My revised offer is $915000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.

Alice, I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, and I appreciate your willingness to work with me. However, I'm still not willing to go above $890000. I'll meet you halfway between $915000 and $890000, so I'll offer $902500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.
